The Walton family of Walmart owns more wealth than the bottom 40% of Americans. Walmart, just like Amazon, pays its workers’ wages that are so inadequate that many of them are forced to depend upon public assistance programs in order to survive.

Repulsive is right. The lunatic fringe will do anything to smear Kavanaugh, including absurdly suggesting that a woman of Mexican and Jewish decent is somehow a secret white supremacist. That’s just nuts. Zina has the highest integrity & those false suggestions are hateful slurs. https://twitter.com/usattybash/status/1037091983532220416 QT @USAttyBash The attacks today on my wife are repulsive. Everyone tweeting this vicious conspiracy theory should be ashamed of themselves. We weren’t even familiar with the hateful symbol being attributed to her for the random way she rested her hand during a long hearing. 1/3

He couldn't.
